DOC.brief_summary: This is a 52-week, multi-center, randomized, open label, parallel group study to assess the long term safety and tolerability of once-daily NVA237, using tiotropium as an active control, in Japanese patients with moderate to severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety and Tolerability of NVA237 Versus Tiotropium in Japanese Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with moderate to severe stable COPD (Stage II or Stage III) according to the Gold Guideline 2008. Current or exsmokers who have a smoking history of at least 10 pack years.
